name: Teledeath
description:
You control multiple characters at once. Every time you die, the first character teleports to the dead one.

This is a very small puzzle game (with some levels being puzzles and some just platforming/tutorial), but hey, at least that's something xD

Controls:
  • A and D (keyboard) or Left Stick or DPad (gamepad) - walk
  • R (keyboard) or LB or RB (gamepad) - restart
  • Escape (keyboard) or Start (gamepad) - exit

The game DOESN'T save your progress, so you should beat it in one go, it's very short anyway ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Vamporelol helped me with the idea a bit
